snippet.title: Australia just logged a huge increase in building approvals
snippet.content:
Australian building approvals just logged the largest monthly increase in nearly a year.
According to the Australian Bureau of Statistics (ABS), total approvals surged by 10.9% in June in seasonally adjusted terms, breezing past expectations for an increase of 1.0%.
It was the largest percentage increase since July 2016.
More to follow...
